replies.bodyText: I think it might be better to have a explicit default value here (or somewhere else) to match all versions if version requirements are not provided.
replies.author: hui-yang

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible that multiple jobs have the same queueAt timestamp? If so, L587 will clear all of them?
timeline.author: ShirleyZheng92

replies.bodyText: This is a possible scenario but the above code should be able to handle that. Second job with same timestamp should not reach L587
replies.author: abanthiy
